statements: SELECT * FROM threat_intelligence_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT indicator_value, description FROM threat_intelligence_data WHERE source = 'Malware Source';
SELECT id, source, indicator_type FROM threat_intelligence_data WHERE indicator_value LIKE '%attack%';
SELECT * FROM threat_intelligence_data WHERE id IN (2, 4, 6);
SELECT source, indicator_type FROM threat_intelligence_data WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM threat_intelligence_data WHERE id = 10;
SELECT id, source, description FROM threat_intelligence_data WHERE indicator_type = 'Malware';
SELECT * FROM threat_intelligence_data WHERE indicator_type = 'IP Address' ORDER BY source ASC;
SELECT id, indicator_type, indicator_value FROM threat_intelligence_data WHERE description LIKE '%ransomware%';
SELECT * FROM threat_intelligence_data WHERE source LIKE '%FireEye%' OR source LIKE '%Symantec%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM threat_intelligence;
SELECT threat_name, timestamp FROM threat_intelligence;
SELECT threat_id, threat_name FROM threat_intelligence ORDER BY threat_name DESC;
SELECT threat_description FROM threat_intelligence WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT share_date, shared_by FROM sharing_data WHERE share_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM threat_intelligence;
SELECT threat_name, timestamp FROM threat_intelligence WHERE threat_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM sharing_data WHERE share_date > '2022-01-01' AND share_date < '2022-06-30';
SELECT threat_name, shared_by FROM threat_intelligence JOIN sharing_data ON threat_intelligence.threat_id = sharing_data.threat_id WHERE sharing_data.shared_by = 'Admin';
SELECT threat_id, COUNT(share_id) AS share_count FROM sharing_data GROUP BY threat_id ORDER BY share_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM Threat_Information;
SELECT threat_id, threat_description FROM Threat_Information ORDER BY threat_id DESC;
SELECT partner_name, partner_location FROM Threat_Sharing_Partners WHERE partner_location = 'USA';
SELECT MAX(threat_date) FROM Threat_Information;
SELECT threat_id, COUNT(*) AS total FROM Verified_Threats GROUP BY threat_id HAVING total > 1;
SELECT * FROM Threat_Information;
SELECT threat_description, threat_source FROM Threat_Information WHERE threat_id = 1;
SELECT COUNT(threat_id) AS total_threats FROM Threat_Information;
SELECT partner_name, partner_location FROM Threat_Sharing_Partners ORDER BY partner_name DESC;
SELECT threat_id, verification_status FROM Threat_Information JOIN Verified_Threats ON Threat_Information.threat_id = Verified_Threats.threat_id WHERE verification_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM threat_intelligence;
SELECT threat_name, threat_type, severity FROM threat_intelligence WHERE severity > 2;
SELECT * FROM security_team ORDER BY team_size DESC;
SELECT team_lead, team_name FROM security_team WHERE team_id = 3;
SELECT platform_id, platform_type FROM sharing_platform WHERE platform_type = 'Public';
SELECT * FROM threat_intelligence WHERE threat_type = 'Malware' AND severity >= 7;
SELECT threat_name, severity FROM threat_intelligence WHERE severity > 5 ORDER BY threat_name ASC;
SELECT team_name, team_size FROM security_team WHERE team_size < 10 ORDER BY team_size DESC, team_name ASC;
SELECT platform_name, access_level FROM sharing_platform WHERE access_level = 'High' OR access_level = 'Critical' ORDER BY platform_name;
SELECT shared_by, shared_with, shared_date FROM shared_data WHERE shared_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY shared_date DESC, shared_by ASC;
SELECT * FROM ThreatActors;
SELECT actor_name, description FROM ThreatActors WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT indicator_value, type FROM Indicators WHERE actor_id = 1;
SELECT incident_name, description FROM Incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT org_name, industry FROM Organizations WHERE country = 'Canada';
SELECT * FROM ThreatActors;
SELECT actor_name, country FROM ThreatActors WHERE actor_id = 1;
SELECT indicator_value, type FROM Indicators WHERE actor_id = 3;
SELECT org_name, industry, country FROM Organizations WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT incident_name, description, incident_date FROM Incidents WHERE incident_date >= '2022-01-01';
